resources.string: WHICH is a general knowledge quiz. There are three categories available for the moment: Literature, Cinema and Science. There are five questions in each category. There is a hint and a lifeline 1/2 for eliminating two of the options. However you can use each of them only once. You have 60 seconds for each question. If time expires you cannot answer that question. You receive 20 points for each right answer.
Are you sure you want to quit the game?
Time expired. Click next for next question
You didn\'t chose any of the options.
Congratulations %1$s! You successfully completed the quiz. You scored 100/100. If you would like compete in another category click new game.
The answer was wrong. You scored %1$d /100.
Welcome to WHICH! Chose a category from below and click start. Don\'t forget to enter your name! Check the menu for rules.
Best record in Literature: %1$d \nBest record in Cinema: %2$d \nBest record in Science: %3$d
